title: Alchemy & Hermetica: From Jabir to Newton
description: Complete collection of alchemical and Hermetic texts spanning Arabic origins through Renaissance European alchemy. Includes Arabic Jabir, Latin Geber, Paracelsian iatrochemistry, Rosicrucian alchemy, and sources for Newton's alchemical studies.

researchValue: This collection documents the complete transmission of alchemical knowledge from Arabic origins through Latin medieval corpus to Renaissance Hermetic synthesis. Essential for understanding early modern chemistry, medical history, Hermetic philosophy, and the intellectual context of the Scientific Revolution. Includes sources that influenced Isaac Newton's alchemical studies.
